item.title: Demystifying .NET Terminology
item.description: So much modern technology is built with Microsoft’s .NET, it seems inevitable that I would have to learn about it eventually. When I did, I found so much of the terminology confusing; things had overlapping names and nothing seemed consistent. This table hopefully helps you (and me!) keep it all straight. Name Description .NET The "application platform" for all other technologies listed here. It consists of: The Common Language Runtime (or CLR) Libraries (standard lib type stuff; i/o, dates and times, etc) Compiler SDK and tools "
